update.public_update_changelog:
• Resolved a bug wherein textboxes from a new save caused a crash within the game.
• Fixed various spelling errors.
update.supporter_update_changelog:
• A bugfix wherein textboxes from a new save caused crashes.
• Fixes for various spelling errors.

news.title: Update 1.9.0 - Public Release!
news.text:
Version 1.9.2 has just been released to the Public - concluding the events of Kirei's Birthday! 
 
This update includes: 
    • 33,000 words (approximately 4 Hours of additional gameplay) 
    • 21 New Events (15 Main Events, 6 Character Events) 
    • News System, in-game Updater & Save Management Tools 
    • Support for {s}Chapter 2{/s}

news.title: 1.9.2 - New Features!
news.text:
Version 1.9.2 has brought the 'Latest News', and the in-game updater! 

The 'Latest News' updates with community & update information! Check here for updates! 

The in-game Updater allows new updates to be installed within the game - without having to reinstall! 

I hope these features make the gameplay experience more enjoyable to you all! :)

news.title: 550 Discord Members!
news.text:
We've reached a grand total of 550 Members over on the Discord - and to celebrate, we voted for a character to receieve a lewd photoshoot! 

Our winners were Natsuki & Kasu - they've got their photoshoot 'Mime and Dash' out on the Discord now!

Consider joining to access to this photoshoot, and all older ones!

news.title: Supporter Render Vote - April 2025
news.text:
Supporters have just finished voting for their monthly supporter photoshoot as a part of their supporter benefits - and this time, the photoshoot included Sakura! 

Consider supporting through either Patreon or Subscribestar to view this month's photoshoot - plus gain access to {b}loads{/b} more extra content!

news.title: Another World 2! (April Fools!)
news.text:
Announcing 'Another World 2: Another-er World' - the newest game in the 'Another World' series! 

Did you think Arvin's emotional journey was over? Think again, IDIOT! 

Another World 2 is here - and it's even Another-er than before! Download 'Another World 2: Another-er World' Today!

news.title: 'Another World' OST on YouTube!
news.text:
Due to popular demand, the official 'Another World' soundtrack is available on Youtube! 

I'll be adding tracks frequently to the channel to share all of the talent that's been accumulated for the soundtrack to this game. Be sure to check it out if you're interested!
